text: z nursing homes – similar to residential care, but accommodating ill or frail elderly people, and staffed by qualified nursing staff (also within use Class C2); z dual-registered care homes – residential care homes where nursing care is provided for those residents who need it (also within use Class C2); z extra-care homes – combinations of the above providing independent living alongside care and support, and sometimes also offering support for older people in the wider community; BACK TO POLICIES z homeless shelters and transitional housing for those experiencing homelessness (sui generis use, C2 use or C3 use depending on the nature of the facility); and z staff accommodation ancillary to a relevant use.
